thread.title: Lamar Odom out of coma, says hi to Khloe Kardashian
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom out of coma, says hi to Khloe Kardashian - Sports

author: PTI
title: Lamar Odom out of coma, says hi to Khloe Kardashian
text:
Lamar Odom greets his estranged wife as he comes out of coma, but ex-NBA star still in critical state
Los Angeles: Former NBA player and reality TV star Lamar Odom has come out of coma. Odom, 35, who was found unconscious at Dennis Hof's Love Ranch South in Pahrump, Nevada, is now breathing on his own, reported Variety.


Lamar Odom 
Lamar is conscious and was able to say hi to Khloe (Kardashian), but his condition remains guarded," a source said. Odom's condition has improved moderately over the past 36 hours.
Doctors are working to make sure his organs function properly. Khloe has been there by her estranged husband's side since Tuesday night. Her sisters Kim, Kourtney, Kylie and mother Kris Jenner have visited him as well.


Khloe Kardashian during a cocktail party at Park Hyatt Guest House in Sydney, Australia on November 19, 2013. Pic/Getty Images 
Odom's apparent consumption of cocaine and Reload pills, was allegedly the main cause of his bad condition. The former Los Angeles Lakers basketball star was unresponsive and was not able to breathe on his own on Friday.
